mapper.sql: SELECT lh.id,lh.stu_id, lh.ss_id, lh.cwc_id, lh.tsg_id, lh.jwc_id, lh.handle_status, lh.update_time, su.user_id, su.dept_id, su.user_name, ls.furniture, ls.indemnity, ls.handle_status AS ls_handle_status, ls.update_time AS ls_update_time, lj.course, lj.credit, lj.handle_status AS lj_handle_status, lj.update_time AS lj_update_time, lc.arrears, lc.total_arrears, lc.handle_status AS lc_handle_status, lc.update_time AS lc_update_time, lt.book_name, lt.overdue_days, lt.handle_status AS lt_handle_status, lt.update_time AS lt_update_time, sd.dept_id, sd.dept_name FROM lxgl_hj lh JOIN sys_user su ON lh.stu_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN lxgl_ss ls ON su.user_id = ls.stu_id LEFT JOIN lxgl_jwc lj ON su.user_id = lj.stu_id LEFT JOIN lxgl_cwc lc ON su.user_id = lc.stu_id LEFT JOIN lxgl_tsg lt ON su.user_id = lt.stu_id JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.dept_id = sd.dept_id
mapper.select: select handle_status,update_time from lxgl_hj where stu_id = #{stuId}

SELECT d.dept_name AS collegeName, COUNT(s.stu_id) AS collegeGraduateNum FROM sys_dept d INNER JOIN sys_dept p ON d.dept_id = p.parent_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT lh.stu_id, sd.parent_id, sd.dept_name FROM lxgl_hj lh INNER JOIN sys_user su ON lh.stu_id = su.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.dept_id = sd.dept_id ) s ON s.parent_id = p.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name;

SELECT d.dept_name AS collegeName, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.handle_status = 0 THEN s.stu_id ELSE NULL END) AS collegeLxIncomplete, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.handle_status = 1 THEN s.stu_id ELSE NULL END) AS collegeLxFinished FROM sys_dept d INNER JOIN sys_dept p ON d.dept_id = p.parent_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT lh.stu_id, lh.handle_status, sd.parent_id, sd.dept_name FROM lxgl_hj lh INNER JOIN sys_user su ON lh.stu_id = su.user_id INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.dept_id = sd.dept_id ) s ON s.parent_id = p.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name;
